translations: n.直觉力；直觉感知，直觉知识

sentences.sentence: Our intuitions about what drives our behaviors are flawed.
sentences.translation: 我们用来推测我们行为动机的直觉都是有缺陷的。

sentences.sentence: Our dualism shows up in intuitions about personal identity.
sentences.translation: 二元论揭示了直觉上的人格同一性。

sentences.sentence: Those really are my intuitions when I think about these cases.
sentences.translation: 当我想到这些案例真的得出了那些直觉。
